Topic.Title: Multiple images in picture frame or drawing grid?

Posts.EditableText: Is it possible to display multiple images in the picture frame or drawing grid? If so does it require any special commands and if not then would it be possible to add this feature to a later release of Quest? This would be a nice feature to like display the picture for the room and then have the picture for the character drawn on top of that.

Posts.EditableText:
You can have any arbitrary HTML you like in the panel - images, text, overlapping divs, whatever. 

Set "clearframe" to false in the game object so the frame won't be cleared on each turn. Then it's as simple as:

 [code:3t2ep30u]JS.setPanelHeight(100)
JS.setPanelContents (someHTMLstring)[/code:3t2ep30u]
